Mobster is charred some, but still doesn't move. He aims at Razorclaw.

Mob=
ster (multiple voices): Doomsday.

Mobster fires 3 times at Razorclaw...
  =
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

  Sent: Tuesday, December 26, 2000 8:36 AM
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice
=


  The blast hit Razor Claws shield, it saved him from the power of the bl=
ast but he'd taxxed it to it's limits. he fell to the ground again spent fr=
om the physical exhertion he'd put on himself. He picked himself up again i=
nsisting on being destroyed on his feet. Fireballs hit Mobster causing Razo=
r Claw to look back. Necromancer had arrived in time to save him.

  Necrom=
ancer saw that he had Mobsters full attention when the giant fired on him. =
He transformed to robot mode shrinking down to a smaller target to dodge th=
e blast. he rased his rifle and set it on high power. he fired five blasts =
at the head of Mobster as he flew down to check the condition of the Raptor=
 he'd just saved.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: SOULSTICE 
  =
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, December 25, 2000 10:33 PM
    =
Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    Mobster fired again at Razorclaw...
    =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
      Sent: Monday, December 25, 2000 4:01 AM
      Subject: Re:=
 Sorry soulstice


      Razor Claw raised to his feat to stubborn to know =
when to quit. he stepped forward, ready for anything the larger bot had to =
offer. "You ready to surrender yet?" He asked sarcastically even though he =
already knew the answer.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From=
: SOULSTICE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, December=
 24, 2000 9:34 PM
        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


        Mobster wa=
tched, wondering how Razorclaw felt...and enjoying the thought. Mobster, as=
 cruel as the Mini-Mafia could be, waited for Razorclaw to regain his stren=
gth and composure, he wanted to knock it out of Razorclaw again...
        =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: CYBERWOLF4 
          To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Monday, December 25, 2000 3:16 AM
      =
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


          Razor Claw bounced off Mobster=
, the impact made his head spin. The mighty raptor heard Mobster have some =
smart ass comment toward him. He looked up in time to see Mobster raise his=
 weapon again. Razor Claw turned and tried to run and got just far enough t=
o avoid being hit directly by the beam. The weapon still had a devastating =
effect on him though as the shrapnel of dirt and pebbles shred at his skin.=
 The blast shot him about sixty yards from where he'd started. He landed wi=
th an ooof as his body skipped multiple times across the hard African groun=
d. There he lay in pain, trying to regain his strength and composure.
     =
       ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: SOULSTICE 
         =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 1:53=
 PM
            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


            Mobster wobbled =
some, but that was the extent of it. He turned around.

            Mobster=
 (Grenade voice): Are you trying to knock me over, little man?

           =
 Mobster fires at Razorclaw once...
              ----- Original Message --=
--- 
              From: CYBERWOLF4 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
              Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 7:54 PM
              Subject=
: Re: Sorry soulstice


              A sudden shadow covered Razor Claw as=
 Mobsters foot raised above him. "Oh Pit" he yelled as he turned to run. Hi=
s energy was low so he didn't want to risk his shield not holding. He ran t=
oward Mobster. Mobsters foot struck the ground behind Razor Claw, the impac=
t shook the ground sending Razor claw rolling past the giant gestalt. He ro=
lled to his feat and turned again ready for battle. He dove forward at Mobs=
ters rear end hoping the giant would still be off balance enough to knock o=
ver.
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: SO=
ULSTICE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Sund=
ay, December 24, 2000 10:46 AM
                Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice=



                (I normally am against stomping, but...)
               =
  
                Mobster raised his foot.

                Mobster (Krack=
en voice): Over!

                Mobster brung his foot down towards Razor=
claw...
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  F=
rom: CYBERWOLF4 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                =
  Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 12:11 PM
                  Subject: Re: S=
orry soulstice


                  Razor Claw remained still as a statue, w=
atching the battle rage around him. He opened a comm to anyone listening. "=
Razor Claw to any available maximal, I'm pinned down and need some coverfir=
e."
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                    F=
rom: SOULSTICE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
               =
     Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 1:16 PM
                    Subject:=
 Re: Sorry soulstice


                    Mobster stood still. The raptor =
would have to move sometime.

                    Mobster (Horn Drill voice=
): He'll have to move sometime. Who helped to build this house?

          =
          Mobster kept his cannon aimed at Razorclaw, waiting and watching.=
..
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
                    =
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
         =
             Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 12:48 PM
                   =
   Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                      Razor Claw knew tha=
t there was only one way to survive a blast from a weapon of that size. he =
transformed to Raptor mode and used full strength on his shield. The ground=
 around him incinerated on contact. He survived but it was sapping to much =
of his strength. The raptor couldn't move without deactivating his shield.
=
                        ----- Original Message ----- 
                     =
   From: SOULSTICE 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
                 Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 10:04 AM
                 =
       Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                        Mobster took =
a scratch of damage, still looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster aimed his gia=
nt cannon at Razorclaw and fired...
                          ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
                          From: CYBERWOLF4 
              =
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent: Friday,=
 December 22, 2000 7:01 AM
                          Subject: Re: Sorry sou=
lstice


                          Razor Claw stood confused for the moment=
, he tried to show no weakness. He stepped forward and hurled his sword at =
Mobster. "Is this supposed to impress me?" he asked looking up at the bot h=
e challenged. 
                            ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
                          From: SOULSTICE 
                            To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                            Sent: Thursday, December 21=
, 2000 10:50 AM
                            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


=
                            Gigas didn't move an inch, seeing as how Mobste=
r was in his place now.

                            Gigas: How about this,=
 I crush you, as Mobster, I crush you, as Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.

      =
                      Mobster switches voices.

                           =
 Kracken: But right now, we're Mobster...
                              ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
                              From: CYBERWOLF4 
=
                              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                     =
         Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
                       =
       Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                              Razor C=
law looked up at his attacker still showing no fear, "That sounds like a ch=
allenge, Let's make this interesting, you knock me down, I join your allian=
ce, I knock you down, you surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepped forw=
ard, pulled his left arm back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stomach. "I'=
ll go first."
                                ----- Original Message ----- =

                                From: SOULSTICE 
                         =
       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                Sent: Wednes=
day, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
                                Subject: Re=
: Sorry soulstice


                                Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho, =
I love an unfair fight. That wasn't my best shot, but I didn't want to wast=
e anything on you. In other words, I am not intimidated. I have seen battle=
s come and go, me taking the brunt of the attack, but i still stand, I stil=
l walk, I still fight. You know, you should join the Alliance, it would do =
you a world of good.

                                Gigas stayed planted =
to his spot, not moving an inch...
                                ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
                                From: CYBERWOLF4 
   =
                             To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      =
          Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
                     =
           Subject: Sorry soulstice


                                Sorry=
, it must've been mixxed up in the battle. I found it.

                   =
             claw struck him, but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and Grenade=
 are both bowled over by the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air and b=
ackflips, happy that he again came through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas looks =
down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the size of the Razorclaw figure and the fac=
t that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swings a=
 huge punch at Razorclaw

                                Razor Claws head =
snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like hell but Razor Claw wo=
uldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be knocked back about ten=
 feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at the attacker and couldn=
't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best shot, I'd hate to have =
to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
                                -----=
 Original Message ----- 
                                From: THECODE 
   =
                             To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      =
          Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
                        =
        Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should=
 get help.


                                OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Raz=
orclaw, post damage...
                                ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
                                From: CYBERWOLF4 
               =
                 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                Se=
nt: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
                                Sub=
ject: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.


  =
                              Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sce=
en of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he mentall=
y reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three unt=
il they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pul=
led his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced to,=
 your choice."

                                He aproached the three bots=
 ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully.
       =
                         ----- Original Message ----- 
                    =
            From: dachande 
                                To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
                                Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:=
40 PM
                                Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ra=
mus


                                ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
       =
                          
                                    They had hea=
rd the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the conflic=
t. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther=
 they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.















=














          eGroups Sponsor
